name: The hidden game society
description:
DISCLAIMER!!!!: THE GAME IS A SHORT EXPERIENCE.

The hidden game society is a digital escape room experience.

Explore the room in search of a way out.
After responding to their invite, you find yourself trapped in this mysterious club.
Can you find your way out?
Tackle this test, succeed, and your membership is assured.

FEATURES


  • Hidden mechanisms, riddles, and secret combinations.
  • Simple controls, easy to play.
  • First person view. Full immersion.
  • Engaging atmosphere.
